q: `` When somebody gets 49 points in the first three quarters obviously its going to draw attention to the other team,'' said Allen Iverson , whose career high of 60 came against Orlando on Feb. 12, 2005. When somebody's got 49 points they want to make sure I get the ball out of my hands, and that's what they did. Rafer Alston responsibly is to give it up and my teammates had to make plays. They couldn't. Stephen A. Smith was 4-for-10 from the field in the fourth and the rest of the team made 3 of 9. While Allen Iverson got cold, Kobe Bryant heated up. Page Six reports that outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt is in talks with`` Parker Spitzer'' executive producer Liza McGuirk on a new show that he would host. The two first connected on the Sunday foreign-affairs program`` Fareed Zakaria GPS, which Liza McGuirk executive produced and where Eric Schmidt was a regular guest. When Eric Schmidt filmed a pilot for CNN in August, Liza McGuirk oversaw the production.

staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals.
